name: vscode-mssql-assistant
description: MSSQL MCP integration with tool invocation & table explorer. Author: Arturo Quiroga, Sr. Azure AI Cloud Solutions Architect for Partners, Microsoft Americas.
author: Arturo Quiroga (Sr. Azure AI Cloud Solutions Architect for Partners, Microsoft Americas)

mssqlAssistant.server.description: SQL Server hostname or address (e.g. myserver.database.windows.net)

mssqlAssistant.database.description: Default database name to connect to

mssqlAssistant.clientId.description: Azure AD Client ID (for managed identity or service principal)

mssqlAssistant.clientSecret.description: Azure AD Client Secret (for service principal, optional if using managed identity)
mssqlAssistant.clientSecret.markdownDescription: Azure AD Client Secret (for service principal, optional if using managed identity). **Do not commit secrets to source control.**

mssqlAssistant.tenantId.description: Azure AD Tenant ID (for service principal, optional if using managed identity)

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run compile
